data.title: Fatima Zahra PBUH
data.meta_description: Fatima Zahra PBUH - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Fatima Zahra (PBUH) was the daughter of the Holy Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) and Khadija (RA). She was married to Ali Ibn Abi Talib (PBUH) and was considered the most virtuous woman by the Prophet. The Prophet said Fatima was not like ordinary women and that her scent reminded him of Jannah. Fatima is described as the chief of women in Jannah and more truthful and honest than anyone except the Prophet. The Prophet showed his love for Fatima by rising for her, kissing her, and having her sit in his place. He said whoever angered Fatima angered him and that displeased her disp
